page.title: 20DOMESDAY PROJECT IN MIDHURST
page.content: The information contained in these pages was researched by the 13 year old,third year pupils at Midhurst Intermediate School as part of their History course. We owe a large debt of thanks to the many people in our area who gave up their time to be interviewed or fill in our questionnaires,and who gave us copies of some very useful and interesting documents.All of this detailed information will appear in the book on the area which we are compiling in school and copies will be distributed to all those who helped us and to the Public Library. It is regrettable that we were not able to gather enough reliable information about the Cowdray family and estate which are important features of the area.
